descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][size=3][size=2][size=4][size=3][size=5][color=#ff7700][color=#00ff00][size=3][color=#ffffff][size=4]
My newest preset and soon to be follower... at some point

[/size][/color]Dont forget to endorse!! :)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85593/?]Xera Follower !! <----
[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/EuWuLPy.jpg?2[/img]
[color=rgb(255, 255, 255)]Make sure to use "Nord"[/color]
Having troubles getting a good screen shot?
[size=2]~~~ 'tfc 1' in 3rd person view ~~~
~~~ 'sucsm 1'  0.1 to 99.9 Speed varies ~~~
~~~ 'Fov 20" Optional ~~~
Your Welcome![/size][/size][/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img]

[youtube]gO-IMr74N0I[/youtube]

[color=#ffffff]Thank you [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/12005443/?]Boxofbeer[/url] for the video![/color]

[size=4][size=3][size=2][img]https://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img][/size][/size][/size]

Mods needed to look like pictures use:
[size=2]
[/size][/color][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]Rudy EnB .308[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70834/?]Demoniacs Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]High Res Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hair Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Race Menu[/url][/size]
[size=4][size=3][size=2][size=4][size=3][size=5][color=#ff7700]
Installation For Face Preset (RM):[/color][/size][/size][/size]
[/size][/size][/size][size=4][size=3][size=2]
1. Do not use NMM for installation, it will not work.[/size][/size][/size]
[size=4][size=3][size=2]2. Download and install requirement mods. Install recommended mods to look like screenshots.
3. Download this Jslot
4. Copy the slot file and paste to Data/SKSE/Chargen/Presets/ (Here)
5. Start the game and go to character creation menu by using
"showracemenu" command and go to Presets tab, and load Xera.jslot

[img]https://i.imgur.com/eWdtxSb.png[/img]

[color=#ff7700][size=5]Credits:[/size][/color]

Links Above[/size][/size][/size][/center]
author: Kayden87
